original_text: The priest must look at the mildew. And he must keep the clothes separate from other clothes for seven days.
korean_text: 제사장은 그 색점을 진찰하고 그것을 이레 동안 간직하였다가

sentences.original_text: The priest must look at the mildew.
And he must keep the clothes separate
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 옷들을 분리해서 보관해야 합니다

sentences.original_text: from other clothes for seven days.
